designSystem.name: Fitness Challenge App Design System
designSystem.description: Clean, card-based design system with gradient colors for fitness challenge applications. Features left-aligned content, modal overlays, and comprehensive interaction patterns.

primary.usage: Main gradient for primary content, hero sections, important stat cards

light.usage: Lighter variant for secondary content, supporting cards, user avatars

deep.usage: Darker variant for emphasis, accent cards, important actions

appContainer.description: Mobile-first container with max width and light background

edgeToEdge.className: bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-blue-800 px-6 py-4 text-white
edgeToEdge.structure: Full width gradient header with app title

withActions.structure: Page title on left, action button on right

baseCard.structure: Gradient background, rounded corners, padding, white text, shadow
baseCard.usage: Primary UI component for all information display

userCard.structure: Avatar + user info on left, rank/action on right
userCard.usage: Leaderboard entries, user profiles, social elements

progressCard.progressBar: bg-white bg-opacity-20 rounded-full h-2 with filled portion

overlay.className: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center z-50 p-4
overlay.description: Full-screen overlay with centered modal positioning

container.className: bg-white rounded-2xl max-w-sm w-full max-h-96 overflow-y-auto
container.description: White container with rounded corners and scroll capability

header.elements: Title on left, close button (X icon) on right

content.sections: Primary card + settings list + action buttons
content.settingsItem: p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-xl with icon, text, and action button

actions.primary: flex-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-blue-600 text-white py-3 px-4 rounded-xl font-semibold
actions.secondary: flex-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 py-3 px-4 rounded-xl font-semibold

items.structure: flex flex-col items-center py-2 px-3 rounded-lg

avatars.style: Emoji-based avatars in circular gradient containers

inputField.usage: Chat inputs, form fields, search bars

dashboard.structure: Edge-to-edge header + user greeting + stat cards + progress cards
dashboard.header: App title centered in gradient header
dashboard.greeting: User avatar + personalized message below header
dashboard.statsLayout: Vertically stacked left-aligned cards with right icons
dashboard.cardVariants: Mixed gradient variants for visual hierarchy

leaderboard.structure: Page title with action + ranking cards
leaderboard.headerAction: Info icon in top right for settings access
leaderboard.visualHierarchy: Top 3 users get special gradients and star icons

chat.messageAlignment: Flex-based (left for others, right for user)
chat.messageStyle: Gradient bubbles for user, gray for others
chat.inputArea: Fixed bottom with text input + gradient send button

settings.structure: Title + user profile card + option cards + logout
settings.profileDisplay: Large user card with edit indicator
settings.optionCards: Icon + title + subtitle + navigation arrow pattern

modal.contentFlow: Primary info card + settings list + button row
modal.interactions: Close on overlay click, close button, action buttons

designPrinciples.cardBased: All information displayed in gradient cards for visual consistency
designPrinciples.leftAlignment: Content aligned to left with supporting elements on right
designPrinciples.gradientHierarchy: Use gradient variants to create clear visual hierarchy
designPrinciples.iconSupport: Icons provide context and visual balance to text content
designPrinciples.modalPatterns: Consistent modal structure for settings and actions
designPrinciples.mobileFirst: Optimized for mobile with touch-friendly targets
designPrinciples.accessibility: High contrast, proper focus states, semantic markup

interactionPatterns.navigation: Bottom tab navigation with active states
interactionPatterns.cardTaps: Cards with hover states for interactive elements
interactionPatterns.modalTriggers: Info icons and buttons that open overlay modals
interactionPatterns.formInteractions: Rounded inputs with focus rings and gradient buttons
interactionPatterns.progressDisplay: Visual progress bars within cards using opacity overlays
interactionPatterns.buttonStates: Gradient buttons with hover state transitions

stateManagement.modalVisibility: useState boolean flags for modal display
stateManagement.dataStructures: Simple objects for user data, arrays for lists

responsiveConsiderations.bottomNavigation: Fixed height with pb-24 offset for content
responsiveConsiderations.modalSizing: max-w-sm for modals, max-h-96 with scroll

implementationGuidelines.statePattern: useState for simple state, props for component communication
implementationGuidelines.iconSystem: Lucide React with consistent sizing and opacity
implementationGuidelines.gradientSystem: Reusable Card component with variant prop
implementationGuidelines.modalPattern: Conditional rendering with overlay and container components
implementationGuidelines.dataFlow: Simple prop passing, minimal state lifting

cardComponent.structure: Variant-based gradient mapping with className composition
cardComponent.usage: Wrap all content in Cards for consistency

modalComponent.closePattern: onClick handlers for overlay and close button

contentGuidelines.statDisplay: Large numbers with context labels and subtitles
contentGuidelines.challengeContent: Clear goals with time-based progress tracking
